channel.title: Cinema & TV on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Cinema & TV on TechnoStreet

item.title: Netflix kicks off 2023 on a patriotic high with Sidharth Malhotra’s ‘Mission Majnu’
item.description: Netflix kicks off 2023 on a patriotic high with Sidharth Malhotra’s ‘Mission Majnu’ Kick-staring 2023 on a patriotic high, Netflix brings to you some of the finest actors, including Sidharth Malhotra, Rashmika Mandanna, Parmeet Sethi, Sharib Hashmi, Kumud Mishra, Zakir Hussain and Mir Sarwar.

item.title: Samantha tears up at ‘Shaakuntalam’ trailer launch event
item.description: Samantha tears up at ‘Shaakuntalam’ trailer launch event At the trailer launch event, Samantha was seen getting emotional and tearing up on the stage.

item.title: Punjabi Singer AP Dhillon hospitalised after suffering injury during US tour
item.description: Punjabi Singer AP Dhillon hospitalised after suffering injury during US tour On Tuesday, the ‘Excuses’ singer took to his Instagram and informed his fans and followers about the same
